channel.title: What can i do about hosting server? need port fowarding help or what can i use
channel.description:
does anyone know how to actually port foward with a real tutorial and not just say ... "ohh go to portfoward.com try that" cuz ive tried 5 times and cant get it to work and dont think it will...
if not does anybody know of what routers or wireless usb networks you can use to connect to the internet what you DONT have to port foward for

ohh wow another person what didnt understand portfoward.com doesnt work for me and hundreds of other people as there computers are differnt…

SO HY SEND ME A LINK TO A TOPIC WHAT ONLY SAYS

I noticed a lot of these questions, check out http://portforward.com
